blades.title: Interactive Media
blades.subtitle: 3D Animation & VFX
blades.intro: From concept to final render, I bring ideas to life in three dimensions for games and film.

portfolio.title: AthenX - Virtual School
portfolio.description: A multiplayer educational game set in a virtual Greek city.
portfolio.details: Designed and built a multiplayer educational game, from 3D environment modeling to cloud server deployment, enabling students to explore virtual classrooms and interact.

portfolio.title: SG Avatars By My Avatar Nation (MAN)
portfolio.description: Built modular avatars and optimized rigs for a Singapore metaverse project.
portfolio.details: Developed shaders and asset pipelines for avatars and clothing, demonstrating large-scale avatar operations, character customization, and real-time optimization.

portfolio.title: Nautiverse - Metaverse Trailer
portfolio.description: Futuristic metaverse trailer with character models and cinematics.
portfolio.details: A portfolio cinematic demonstrating character animation and VFX pipeline for a futuristic metaverse trailer. It features character models, environment design, and sequenced cinematics with stylized neon visuals.

portfolio.title: Fall of Lucifer Book Trailer
portfolio.description: Cinematic trailer with volumetric effects and character animation.
portfolio.details: A cinematic trailer built with volumetric effects, character animation, and sequencer-driven cinematics to demonstrate a polished cinematic pipeline for publishing and marketing.

portfolio.title: NollyFunMerch - Product Visualization
portfolio.description: High-fidelity 3D product renders for e-commerce.
portfolio.details: High-fidelity 3D product renders and motion promos optimized for web and social ads, serving as commercial-grade visuals for e-commerce campaigns.

portfolio.title: Fashion AR - Trailer & Demo
portfolio.description: AR demo for virtual garment try-on with cloth simulation.
portfolio.details: An AR demo for virtual garment try-on, featuring cloth simulation and mobile-optimized shaders. It serves as a bridge between high-fidelity fashion assets and real-time AR pipelines.

portfolio.title: Alien Race Game Characters
portfolio.description: 24 unique alien characters for an interstellar game.
portfolio.details: Designed and sculpted a diverse roster of 24 unique alien characters, organized into 12 distinct races, establishing a unique visual identity for the game's universe.

portfolio.title: Nessie3D VFX Shot
portfolio.description: 3D creature model seamlessly integrated into a VFX shot.
portfolio.details: Modeled, animated, and rendered a 3D lake monster for seamless VFX integration into a film production, creating a complete, film-ready VFX sequence.

portfolio.title: D-Belt - Product Ad
portfolio.description: Promotional video visualizing a medical product’s functionality with 3D visuals.
portfolio.details: Promotional video visualizing a medical product’s functionality with 3D visuals and storyboard-driven shots. Impact: Product storytelling via cinematic visuals.

portfolio.title: Inner Child - 3D Short
portfolio.description: Narrative-driven 3D animated short.
portfolio.details: A symbolic 3D animated short, managing the full character and environment pipeline from modeling to final VFX in Unreal Engine.

portfolio.title: Jab Jab - Highest Jump (Ad)
portfolio.description: High-energy, cinematic 3D ad for an energy drink.
portfolio.details: A dynamic, broadcast-quality commercial by integrating custom 3D characters, environments, and high-impact visual effects.

portfolio.title: Dark Forest - Game Trailer
portfolio.description: Anime-styled fantasy trailer with procedural foliage.
portfolio.details: An example of environment design and cinematic sequencing in a real-time engine, featuring procedural foliage, volumetrics, and cinematic compositing.

portfolio.title: Caliente Network Media Campaign (3 Trailers)
portfolio.description: Three cinematic trailers for a media campaign.
portfolio.details: Produced three cinematic trailers for a media campaign, including environment builds, motion graphics, and color-graded edits, demonstrating the ability to produce multi-video campaign content at scale.

portfolio.title: Metaverse Music Festival Video Trailer
portfolio.description: 3D animated trailer for a metaverse music festival.
portfolio.details: Directed and produced a visually engaging promotional video by building custom 3D environments, animating multiple characters, and integrating concert-style VFX.

portfolio.title: Jay Worthy Music Video - 'My World'
portfolio.description: Augmented live-action music video with cinematic 3D environments and animated characters.
portfolio.details: A cross-medium visual production that blends VFX and real-world footage by integrating cinematic 3D environments and animated characters into a live-action music video.

portfolio.title: Youtopia - Metaverse and NFT Marketplace
portfolio.description: Interactive metaverse with avatar systems and commerce flows.
portfolio.details: An interactive metaverse 'city' with avatar systems, galleries, and prototype commerce flows for digital assets. It demonstrates content and UX flows for an online interactive space.

portfolio.title: SmartGym - Virtual Trainer App
portfolio.description: Web-based virtual trainer with AI pose detection & 3D avatars.
portfolio.details: A proof-of-concept for interactive at-home fitness experiences using AI pose detection and animated 3D avatars delivering guided workouts.

portfolio.title: Space Wars - SFML based C++ Game
portfolio.description: 2D space shooter game in C++ using the SFML multimedia library.
portfolio.details: Developed a 2D space shooter game in C++ using the SFML multimedia library for graphics, input, and audio management. It was a key project for transitioning from console-based development to graphical applications.

portfolio.title: Monopoly Game
portfolio.description: A complete, console-based Monopoly game in C++.
portfolio.details: Built a complete, console-based Monopoly game in C++, featuring pixel graphics and support for up to 4 human or AI players. This project implemented complex game logic and multiplayer turn management.

portfolio.title: Jurasic Park Pixels
portfolio.description: A console-based game using C++ to render pixel graphics.
portfolio.details: Developed a console-based game using C++ to render pixel graphics and implement core game mechanics, demonstrating foundational programming skills.

certifications.name: Epic Games Game Design Professional Certification
certifications.details: Official certification in game design principles and practices from Epic Games, core to interactive media development.

certifications.name: Essential Skills in Generative AI for Creatives
certifications.details: Certified skills in leveraging generative AI to accelerate creative workflows in media production.

certifications.name: Essential Skills in Premiere Pro
certifications.details: Official certification in professional video editing and post-production with Adobe Premiere Pro.

certifications.name: Essential Skills in Adobe Photoshop
certifications.details: Official certification in image editing, manipulation, and digital artistry with Adobe Photoshop.

certifications.name: C++ Programming Professional Certificate
certifications.details: Professional certification in C++, a foundational language for high-performance game development in Unreal Engine.

certifications.name: Career Essentials in Generative AI
certifications.details: Core skills in applying generative AI, relevant for modern technical art and content creation pipelines.

blades.title: AI & Full Stack
blades.subtitle: Automation & Web App Development
blades.intro: Building intelligent agents and full-stack SaaS applications to create innovative, automated user experiences.

portfolio.title: AI-Powered Cinematographic Shot Generator
portfolio.description: Full-stack tool that converts narrative text into shot lists and generative prompts.
portfolio.details: A full-stack tool that converts narrative text into continuity-aware shot lists and generative prompts for pre-production pipelines. It speeds up planning and produces prompts for image/video pipelines.

portfolio.title: TwoFold AI-Powered Relationship Platform
portfolio.description: A privacy-first dual-agent coaching platform.
portfolio.details: A privacy-first dual-agent coaching platform providing per-user assistants and a joint strategist for shared goals. It demonstrates privacy-by-design orchestration and UX flows for personal-coaching AI.

portfolio.title: Veritas Lens: AI Fact Checker Extension
portfolio.description: A browser extension for critical evaluation of online content.
portfolio.details: An AI-powered browser extension designed to help users critically evaluate online content with on-demand fact-checking, source analysis, and counterarguments. It accelerates research by providing instant feedback.

portfolio.title: AI Career Copilot Web App
portfolio.description: An AI-powered tool for optimizing resumes.
portfolio.details: An AI-powered career co-pilot that analyzes resumes against job descriptions, providing an ATS match score and actionable feedback. It streamlines the resume optimization process with instant, AI-driven feedback.

portfolio.title: AI-Powered Social Media Scheduler
portfolio.description: Serverless scheduler that adapts posts for different platforms.
portfolio.details: A serverless scheduler that adapts a single post into platform-optimized variants and queues publish tasks. It serves as a prototype for cross-platform content adaptation.

portfolio.title: Diet AI: Calorie & Nutrition Tracker
portfolio.description: Multi-modal food logging (image/voice/text) converting inputs into structured nutrition entries and daily summaries.
portfolio.details: A demo of a privacy-first food-tracking flow with multimodal input, converting inputs into structured nutrition entries and daily summaries.

portfolio.title: PromptGod: AI Prompt Engineering Assistant
portfolio.description: A browser extension that helps writers construct and test better prompts.
portfolio.details: A productivity tool for prompt iteration and standardized prompt templates that helps writers construct and test better prompts by providing reusable templates and local caching.

portfolio.title: Advanced Video Stream Detection Browser Extension
portfolio.description: An internal research tool to analyze streaming quality and detect broken or low-quality segments.
portfolio.details: An internal research tool to analyze streaming quality and detect broken or low-quality segments for publishers and integrators. Designed for lawful publisher QA and integration testing.

portfolio.title: AI-Powered Web App Planning & Generation Workflow
portfolio.description: A workflow that turns a plain-English spec into a runnable app scaffold.
portfolio.details: A developer productivity tool for bootstrapping MVPs by turning a plain-English spec into a runnable app scaffold (directory + starter files) to accelerate prototyping.

portfolio.title: CV Genie: AI-Powered Curated Resume(s) Generator
portfolio.description: Generates ATS-friendly resumes and tailored application content from user-provided data.
portfolio.details: A personal productivity tool for job applicants that generates ATS-friendly resumes and tailored application content from user-provided data and templates, outputting high-quality PDFs.

portfolio.title: Automated AI Job Application Prototype
portfolio.description: A research prototype for an automated workflow for assembling tailored applications.
portfolio.details: A research prototype demonstrating an automated workflow for assembling tailored applications (resume, cover letter, tracking), intended for personal productivity demos with an ethics-first approach.

portfolio.title: SmartGym - Virtual Trainer App
portfolio.description: Web-based virtual trainer with AI pose detection & 3D avatars.
portfolio.details: A proof-of-concept for interactive at-home fitness experiences using AI pose detection and animated 3D avatars delivering guided workouts.

certifications.name: AI Agent Developer
certifications.details: Certification in the end-to-end development and deployment of autonomous AI agents.

certifications.name: Generative AI Automation Specialization
certifications.details: Specialization focused on automating complex tasks and workflows using generative AI models.

certifications.name: IBM RAG and Agentic AI
certifications.details: Certified in building advanced AI systems using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and agentic architectures.

certifications.name: Google IT Automation with Python
certifications.details: Certified skills in automating IT infrastructure, system administration, and development tasks using Python.

certifications.name: Programming with Python Professional Certificate
certifications.details: Professional certification covering procedural programming, problem-solving, and core Python skills for AI.

certifications.name: Docker Foundations Professional Certificate
certifications.details: Certified knowledge in containerization and deploying applications with Docker for scalable solutions.

blades.title: Project Management
blades.subtitle: Leadership & Agile Methods
blades.intro: Steering projects from conception to completion with a focus on agile methodologies and strategic team leadership.

portfolio.title: Zenith Adventures Web Portal
portfolio.description: Built the full booking portal and databases for a travel company.
portfolio.details: Built a real-world operational system used to manage over 25 group trips, including the full booking portal and databases for a travel company.

portfolio.title: Student Learning Network App
portfolio.description: Developed a collaborative learning network app.
portfolio.details: Developed a full-stack mobile solution, engineering both the native Android front-end and the PHP-based back-end for a complete educational platform.

portfolio.title: Website for Kidney Transplant Donation Drive
portfolio.description: Developed a robust, comprehensive donation drive website to fund a friend's kidney transplant, featuring detailed case documentation, cost transparency, and multi-media advocacy.
portfolio.details: The site provided transparent information on the case, including medical reports, a detailed justification of costs, and real-time database-connected updates on the patient's condition and fundraising progress, alongside personal video explanations from the friend.

portfolio.title: EcoHope Donor & Child Portal
portfolio.description: Designed and deployed a secure web portal for an NGO, centralizing street children profiles, psychological assessments, and donor communication.
portfolio.details: Streamlined reporting and enabled transparent monitoring, deepening donor engagement and trust. Presented as a user-data-only tool; strict data privacy and access controls were implemented to protect sensitive information.

portfolio.title: Interactive Portfolio: The SwissArmyKnife Site
portfolio.description: A dynamic portfolio built with React, Tailwind CSS, and WebGL to create an immersive user experience.
portfolio.details: This project was a self-driven initiative to build a portfolio that does more than just list skills—it demonstrates them. Built from the ground up using a modern frontend stack including React and Vite for a lightning-fast development experience. The user interface is styled with Tailwind CSS and brought to life with Framer Motion for fluid animations. A key feature is the integration of 3D elements using WebGL (via the 'ogl' library) to create unique, interactive project galleries, providing a more engaging way to explore my work.

portfolio.title: Commravel Website
portfolio.description: Designed and developed a web portal to connect travelers with users needing to send or receive items internationally.
portfolio.details: Built a functional prototype for a peer-to-peer logistics network, demonstrating skills in full-stack web development and user portal design.

certifications.name: ServiceNow IT Leadership Professional Certificate
certifications.details: Professional certification in IT leadership, strategic planning, and technology project management.

certifications.name: Career Essentials in GitHub Professional Certificate
certifications.details: Certified skills in using GitHub for version control, collaboration, and agile project management.

certifications.name: AI for Organizational Leaders
certifications.details: Certification on leveraging artificial intelligence for strategic advantage and organizational leadership.

certifications.name: Agentic AI and AI Agents for Leaders Specialization
certifications.details: Specialized knowledge in leading teams and projects that involve the development and deployment of AI agents.

experience.title: Career & Experience
experience.intro: A timeline of my professional journey, highlighting key roles, responsibilities, and achievements.

timeline.achievement: Designed and launched a full-stack donor and child profile portal; built and deployed the organization's scalable website and database systems.
timeline.details: Designed and launched a full-stack donor and child profile portal, ensuring transparency and streamlined access to key information. Built and deployed the organization's website and database systems, creating a scalable foundation for future growth. Led IT operations, managing infrastructure, security, and digital tools to support day-to-day NGO activities. Applied automation and system design thinking to reduce manual data handling and improve efficiency for staff and volunteers.

timeline.achievement: Overhauled pipelines into an AI-first production model, built generative AI workflows for 2D/3D asset creation (50% faster).
timeline.details: Overhauled pipelines into an AI-first production model. Built generative AI workflows for 2D/3D asset creation (50% faster). Automated animation & rendering pipelines (removing bottlenecks). Deployed AI-driven content generation for marketing & social media. Designed automated digital asset management systems.

timeline.achievement: Built and optimized workflows for Unreal Engine, VFX, and game pipelines.
timeline.details: Built and optimized workflows for Unreal Engine, VFX, and game pipelines. Created custom tools, shaders, and procedural systems. Integrated art + code to deliver high-quality cinematics and real-time content. Directed technical art teams on character rigs, animation, and environments.

timeline.achievement: Delivered custom AI SaaS apps, automations, and AI-powered tools for clients.
timeline.details: Delivered custom AI SaaS apps, automations, and AI-powered tools for clients. Automated business ops via Zapier/Make + Python. Developed generative AI solutions for animation, marketing, and branding.

timeline.achievement: Specialized in 3D character animation for trailers, music videos, and metaverse projects.
timeline.details: Specialized in 3D character animation for trailers, music videos, and metaverse projects. Created 3D fashion animations & immersive environments. Delivered hybrid AI + 3D productions for clients.

timeline.achievement: Worked on Youtopia, AthenX, and Kaaba3D, focusing on shaders, rigging, level design, and optimization.
timeline.details: Worked on Youtopia, AthenX, and Kaaba3D. Focused on shaders, rigging, level design, and optimization in Unreal Engine.

timeline.achievement: Developed shaders and asset pipelines for avatars + clothing (Blender, Clo3D → Unreal).
timeline.details: Developed shaders and asset pipelines for avatars + clothing (Blender, Clo3D → Unreal). Built a futuristic metaverse city (gaming, shopping, social hubs). Produced trailers & character showcases for marketing.

timeline.achievement: Ran a travel startup, leading 25+ trips across Pakistan.
timeline.details: Ran a travel startup, leading 25+ trips across Pakistan. Built the full portal for event & booking management. Developed expertise in project management, leadership, and operations.

timeline.achievement: Built trading systems and strategies using technical + fundamental analysis.
timeline.details: Built trading systems and strategies using technical + fundamental analysis.

testimonials.name: Usman Ali
testimonials.text: Muzahir is very talented and follows the highest work ethics. His skillset helped us to make our client very happy with realistic animations.

testimonials.name: Tallal Saghir
testimonials.text: Muzahir is a highly talented professional in the 3D and VFX arts industry, possessing a deep understanding of industry concepts and demonstrating exceptional creativity in his work.

testimonials.name: Syed Muhammad Ali Musa
testimonials.text: I had the pleasure of mentoring Muzahir Abbas during the Fundamentals of Computer Programming (FOCP) lab... I highly recommend Muzahir to any organization looking for a talented and committed professional.

testimonials.name: Afia Javed
testimonials.text: Muzahir is one of the most talented and dedicated professionals I’ve had the pleasure of working with... I highly recommend Muzahir for any position or project where strong leadership, a creative mindset, and dedication are valued.

testimonials.name: Kumail Naqvi
testimonials.text: I had the pleasure of working with Muzahir Abbas at SparkE Productions, and I can confidently attest to his exceptional skills and outstanding character... I'm honored to call Muzahir not only a colleague but also a close friend.

testimonials.name: Wajahat Hassan
testimonials.text: I have had the privilege of co-founding a company with Mr. Muzahir Abbas... His mastery over industry-standard software like Unreal Engine... makes him a must-have asset in any company or organization.

testimonials.name: Hira Batool
testimonials.text: Muzahir is a 3D wizard! He has a rare ability to balance artistic vision with technical expertise. Muzahir is an exceptionally talented 3D artist and game developer...

testimonials.name: Muhammad Atif
testimonials.text: I highly recommend Muzahir Abbas for his exceptional expertise in 3D programming and game design... His dedication, attention to detail, and collaborative spirit make him an invaluable team member.

testimonials.name: Areeba Naqvi
testimonials.text: I have had the pleasure of working with Muzahir Abbas a remarkably professional and talented CG artist and VFX generalist... I highly recommend Muzahir for any position or project that requires a top-tier CG artist and VFX generalist.

testimonials.name: M. Yasir Hayat Khan
testimonials.text: Muzahir is a standout Technical CG Artist and Generalist. His skills in procedural workflows for CG, VFX, cinematics, and game development are top-notch.

testimonials.name: Mushahid Abbas
testimonials.text: I highly recommend Muzahir Abbas, who I had the pleasure of co-founding a company with... He quickly learns new tools and techniques, which helps in adapting to different projects.

testimonials.name: Mohsin Iqbal
testimonials.text: I have had the pleasure of knowing and working alongside Muzahir Abbas for over five years, and it is with great enthusiasm that I recommend him as an outstanding 3D Technical Artist.
